alert.note: Alert for Clay (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 2:31PM CST until January 03 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clay County in east central Alabama... * Until 315 PM CST. * At 231 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Winterboro to Parkdale, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lineville, Ashland, Barfield, Cragford, Roselle, Millerville and Mellow Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
